entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Marystown
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:04 PM NST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -11.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Winterland Branch Hill 3:30 PM NST Sunday 26 February 2023
Temperature: -11.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 58 %
Wind Chill: -21
Dewpoint: -18.0°C
Wind: 26 km/h gust 37 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20 except minus 14 along the coast. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 20 except minus 14 along the coast. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 20 except minus 14 along the coast.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing before morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the evening. Low minus 20 except minus 14 along the coast. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 26 February 2023
